articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: S&P 500 falls 1%, under pressure by tech; Bank of America, Wells Fargo slip after earnings: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Traders digested a fresh batch of earnings and monitored geopolitical developments.
articles.content:
Stocks moved lower on Wednesday for a second day, pulling back further from record levels, as traders digested a fresh batch of earnings and monitored geopolitical developments.

articles.title: Bank of America Reports Fourth Quarter 2025 Financial Results - Bank of America
articles.description: Bank of America reported its fourth quarter 2025 financial results today. The news release, supplemental filing and investor presentation can be accessed at Bank of America’s Investor Relations website at https://investor.bankofamerica.com/quarterly-earnings.
